ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. Thomas J. Melnick ** RESIGNATION AND ANNUITY **
PrecisResignation and granting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. THOMAS J. MELNICK, a Judge of the Supreme Court of British Columbia, effective October 31, 2015.
